main event: A witness reported seeing a bright, rapidly spinning object emitting a glow over Durand, Illinois on April 15, 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed by several students and a teacher, who all corroborated the sighting.
The object appeared to be about 30-40 feet in diameter and moved slowly towards the horizon before rapidly accelerating out of sight.
No photograph was taken, as the sighting happened very quickly.
The witness, an industrial art instructor, stated that the students were very excited and frightened by the incident.
Another sighting was reported on the same day in the nearby town of Algonquin, Illinois.
sighted object: A bright, rapidly spinning object emitting a glow
